text: is a 2002 Japanese film directed by Hideyuki Hirayama. ==Cast== * Kyōzō Nagatsuka as Ippei Kurasawa * Nene Ohtsuka as Ryoko Kurasawa * Mickey Curtis as Kiichiro Aisawa * Jun Kunimura as Akio Yoshizumi * Kitarō as Kentaro Inamatsu * Shuzo Mitamura as Keiji Uzaki * Kumija Kim as Sakiko Inamatsu * Kaho Minami as Takako Motoyoshi * Izumi Yukimura as Sanae Inamatsu ==Awards== 24th Yokohama Film Festival *Won: Best Director - Hideyuki Hirayama *Won: Best Cinematography *Won: Best Actor - Kyōzō Nagatsuka *Won: Best Supporting Actress - Nene Otsuka *7th Best Film ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2002 films Category:Films directed by Hideyuki Hirayama Category:Japanese films
title: The Laughing Frog
